info.title: home-iot-api
info.description: The API for the EatBacon IOT project

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: max number of records to return

post.description: sets a dimmer to a specific value on a timer
sets a switch to a specific value on a timer

get.description: gets the state of the heater

post.description: turns the heater on or off

LightingZoneStatus.description: the status of the lighting zone.

id.description: the unique identifier for the zone
the unique identifier for the zone

timestamp.description: the timestamp when the temperature was measured
